paper_abstract: Multicore systems allow the efficient implementation of signal processing algorithms for communication systems due to their high parallel processing capabilities. In this paper, we present a high-throughput multicore implementation of a fixed-complexity tree-search-based detector interesting for MIMO wireless communication systems. Experimental results confirm that this implementation allows to accelerate the data detection stage for different constellation sizes and number of subcarriers.
paper_title: Multicore implementation of a fixed-complexity tree-search detector for MIMO communications
